attributes.action: Stop using taxpayer pounds (paid in by English, Scottish and Welsh taxpayers) to fund English Heritage.
attributes.additional_details: How is it possible for anything called 'English Heritage' to be funded with taxpayer pounds taken from Scotland, and Wales?  The obscenity of funding this flawed organisation, in these days of taxayer austerity, is absolutely indefensible to anybody who has ANY probity, honesty and integrity cells left in his body.
